Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan® Dried Gram Negative MIC/Combo Panels
MicroScan® ESBL plus ESBL Confirmation Panel
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of rapidly growing gram negative bacilli
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): MicroScan® Dried Gram Negative MIC/Combo Panels
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Dried Gram Negative MIC/Combo Panels for antimicrobial susceptibility and ESBL screening/confirmation in E. coli, Klebsiella spp., and Proteus mirabilis
Indications for Use Summary: Determination of antimicrobial susceptibilities of rapidly growing gram negative bacilli colonies and screening/confirmation of ESBL production in E. coli, Klebsiella spp., and Proteus mirabilis
